ygData.subject: Fun with Evil Eyes
ygData.msgSnippet: My necro fought an EE in East Karana with a pet.  I of course got charmed, the pet was fighting me and I died.  Was bound in the zone, so when I came back to
ygData.messageBody:
My necro fought an EE in East Karana with a pet. I of course got charmed,
the pet was fighting me and I died. Was bound in the zone, so when I came
back to get my corpse, the pet was just standing there, non-aggro. I
brought up another pet and they duelled... hehe We won, but got no exp...
<sigh> That would be an interesting way to make easy exp... hehe

Olgwinn Pedragun
Bard of 47 Missed Notes
Crimson Legacy
E'ci
